nist.Utility

Class Functions

  • java.lang.Object
    • nist.Utility.Functions

  • public class Functions
extends Object
    Utility class providing commonly used functions and constants for file paths. This class includes helper methods for string validation and numeric formatting.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Carlos

    • Method Detail

      • CheckString

        public static String CheckString(String value)
        Checks if a given string is null and returns an empty string instead.
        Parameters:
        value - The string to be checked.
        Returns:
        The original string if not null; otherwise, an empty string.

      • fourDecimalsDouble

        public static Double fourDecimalsDouble(Double value)
        Formats a given double value to four decimal places. Returns 0.00 if the value is less than or equal to 0.
        Parameters:
        value - The double value to format.
        Returns:
        The formatted double value rounded to four decimal places.
